custom-sql.sql: select campaignId, campaignName, flaskads_adcustomer.customerId, flaskads_adcustomer.customerName, flaskads_adcampaign.eventTypeId, flaskevents_eventtype.eventTypeName, CONCAT_WS(', ', IF(displayGeneral=1, 'General',null) , IF(displayPreEvent=1, 'Pre-Event',null) , IF(displayDuringEvent = 1, 'During-Event',null) , IF(displayPostEvent = 1, 'Post-Event', null)) as 'eventDisplayTime', frequencyPerHour from flaskads_adcampaign inner join flaskads_adcustomer on flaskads_adcustomer.customerId = flaskads_adcampaign.customerId inner join flaskevents_eventtype on flaskevents_eventtype.eventTypeId = flaskads_adcampaign.eventTypeId
